So cute and retro I wanna live in them. High waisted but doesn’t dig in when I sit

These fit a bit on the snug side of "true to size" but over all a quality comfy short!

These were so cute! They were a slimmer fit than my normal shorts choice (I have athletic thighs so I like a roomier fit normally) but I was surprised how much I liked them. I almost purchased but liked so many things in this box I decided to send back.
These shorts are the perfect fit - not too short, not too long. Go with everything and I ended up buying them!
Cute but not quite high rise enough for me. Prob won’t keep but will wear a bunch this month anyway.
Just received but I already know I will buy them! I sized down one size and they are just a little loose, which feels nice. Very soft and comfy!
Cute just too large
Considering buying this top! I received so many compliments in it and love the fringe detail. It truly fit like a glove.

Loved this top, and it fit pretty well. A size 10 is usually pretty loose/comfy on me, but this top was snug across the chest. Also, the straps aren’t adjustable and kept falling down. I eventually just tucked them in like a strapless top. Would be amazing if straps were adjustable.
This was made for my small chest and poofy tummy. Was able to whip off my bra and dance around in it at a zoom dance party. Decided to keep it so I can dance in it some more!
Love this top! Perfect for summer
such a cute shirt and print, but the fabric bubbles out and makes me look like I have a bump. so disappointed because otherwise, it's adorable
Very cute too but didn’t fit across my chest.

I really love this top. The back of it is fun -- open and breezy which is great for warm days. The fabric lays nicely and I love the print. Very easy to wear with jeans or shorts. Easy piece for spring.

links_reviews_title: Hue is more purple, less charcoal
links_reviews_text: I had real plans for this jacket but then it arrived and skewed purple. Pretty, but not as easy to pair with other items. It's incredibly soft, and I really would've liked it had it looked a bit more like the photo!
Great jacket!
Great with white pants

I almost bought this jacket because I love the weight and color and style, but it was just too short for me. I am very long-torsoed, and this piece is shorted so there was about 2"-3" of gap between the jacket and my pants... Exactly right to showcase love handles
Versatile piece. Light layer perfect for spring. Love the collar less update to the denim jacket. Very stretchy. Only thing missing is side pockets. Has a pink/cream undertone to the wash.
Flattering and super fun

links_reviews_title: Not fit for my body type

Loved but coronavirus social distancing happened before I could wear them - will order again

Very tight which requires wearing them so they stretch but also tend toward see through and unflattering because they are white. links_reviews_title: Great petite length, not see thru white denim

So cute! Wish they fit me - I ordered too a size too large. I could not wear them.
This was super flattering but I didn’t end up wearing because my vacation was canceled. I’ll be renting again.

This dress is gorgeous! Very flattering fit. One advantage to keeping my subscription open during COVID is the availability of pieces in my size that I previously couldn’t get. It fits great, I think the 4P may have worked as well, for a tighter fit. I am planning on purchasing this one, I am debating buying this one or trying the 4P and then deciding between them. So excited to have this dress in my wardrobe!
I sized up and this dress was still overly clingy and unflattering on me.
Fit lovely, well made, the colors are gorgeous!
Well, I knew going in that the size was iffy... will go up next time, as this is beautifully cut and the fabric is amazing!
Wore this on a trip to Palm Springs, and all of the girls in our trip loved it. Very fun to have for an event, and I don't have to feel bad that I won't wear it again soon because it's a rental!

links_reviews_title: Wish I Could Wear it Again!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress! Wore it to a wedding and got a ton of complements. It was comfortable and flattering.

For sleeveless dresses I’m usually a size 4 or 6, but based on how small other dresses from this designer ran, I got a size 8. And I’m so happy I sized up, because this fabric has no stretch. The size 8 gave me a tiny bit of extra room around my ribcage to breath and gave my size M/L hips enough space. Dress is lovely and well made.
unfortunately, I didn't have anywhere to salsa dance. I am a pretty solid 6-8 and this was too tight for me to feel comfortable. Also a lot of cleavage.
Loved this dress! Had a lot of fun swishing around in it, it was super comfortable, and the petite worked perfectly for my 5'1ish self.

This dress for true to size and was stunning. Wore it out to a really nice dinner and loved the flow of the ruffles along the bottom and the pattern was beautiful. Had adjustable straps too which helps with the fit!

This dress fit perfectly and the color is beautiful for spring/ summer. Unfortunately the fabric looks a lot different than in the photo. It's almost shiny, and just doesn't look as high quality as it does in the picture.
The fabric is super soft and silky. Fits very well!

links_reviews_title: The model rocked this harder than I did
links_reviews_text: Cute dress, but it kindof had "grandma vibes". I wanted to wear this for brunch out in NYC, but it just felt a little to frumpy for that. Ended up wearing it to work with a jean jacket.

A rarity for Anthro, but this actually runs quite small. I followed the advice of the prior reviewers and sized up thankfully because it just barely fit. Wore for Easter in a quarantine but still wanted to look cute!

I decided against buying this because I wasn't sure when I'd even be able to wear it again with COVID happening. But, it's so adorable and feminine and on trend right now. Very soft and silky material, flattering. I got a size 2P and for reference, I am 5'1", small bust, with hips. It fit perfectly.

I wore this with a jacket and sneakers to dinner and it was a lot of fun! The style was flattering and fun, but I found it a little tight fitting in the stomach and mid section area. I didn't love the colors at first, but it is much prettier once on and very easy to dress up or down.
I wanted this one to work so bad, but it was really baggy in my waist and too tight across my hips. But I faked it for a moment for a photo because the colors were so nice.
Definitely would size up in this. Very snug around hips but very very pretty
The material was beautiful and super silky! The dress had more of a formal vibe than what I was going for but I really loved the fit.
This dress is exactly as pictured. The material is really nice, and so is the fit. I love it!

links_reviews_title: Size Up, The Fit is Wonky
links_reviews_text: I got a whole box of dresses so that I could find one to wear to a wedding. This dress was NOT the winner. I own Maeve dresses in the same size that fit great. If this is also you, I recommend sizing up 1 to 2 sizes here, depending on where you carry your weight. It is extremely tight in the bust/ rib cage area. Proceed with caution ladies. I felt like a sausage.
Too long

links_reviews_title: Cute pattern, but lots of material
links_reviews_text: After trying it on, there was too much loose/bulk material gathering at the waist where the belt ties and the length didn't flatter my figure. I didn't wear this one, but it has a nice pattern.

The material of this dress is very stiff and I felt like I was being swallowed in it. I tried it on but never wore it out of the house. The slip that came underneath was really cute - I would totally wear that out lol but I got this dress for work and it just did not work for me. I'm 5'9" and it was really long on me so be wary, especially it you're short - this will be extremely long on you. Normally a huge Anthro fan but this dress was a miss for me.
Pretty spring dress but size down
Super fun print, will definitely catch people's eyes.
Huge and unflattering like a paper bag

links_reviews_title: Fun, bright and cheerful! Runs BIG.
links_reviews_text: This dress is beautiful! So fun for spring. It does run BIG. I was worried that it was going to run small, so I got a Medium and it was huge. I should have gotten an XS or S. If it was too small, then I could have worn a tank underneath and have the top open.

On the plus side the dress is pretty and would be great for temperatures a little more spring-like than I had while renting. On the downside the fabric is heavy and the dress runs big, so it's kind of a lot. The slip seemed pretty TTS though so it may be hard to size down.
Wish I sized down. It was big. Has great construction though with an interior slip and great pockets.
Maybe if I would have sized down, it would have been better but it was a lot of fabric. Seemed bulky. Couldn't personally wear it. If you try it, size down.

links_reviews_title: Lovely pattern, not a great fit
links_reviews_text: To start with the pros: The pattern is lovely. The fabric is a true, starchy shirt dress material. Now come the cons: The fit is awful. The dress balloons up in the bust, hips, and sleeves no matter how you tie the belt. The result is deeply unflattering. I really wanted to like this dress but this is one that won't be worn, unfortunately.
I thought this dress would be so cute for work but it was disappointing. It was HUGE and the material is more like a stark button down than the silky material I was expecting.

The fabric is super cute and colorful, great for spring - definitely a true shirt dress material. Unfortunately even the XS in petites was too much fabric around the torso, even using the belt to cinch. Size down here!
Beautiful print and flattering cut! I was so close to buying this one!

Beautiful Babydoll dress I did not end up wearing because of the new way of life at home. Ran large and was longer and wider than I thought. If I would wear it out I would belt it with wedges. I really did live it.
I loved the embroidery and fit. Too short for work for me
I love this dress! I ordered it in petite, which was a little shorter than I expected, but still wearable. Otherwise the fit was true to size and comfortable. I will defiantly rent this dress again!
This dress is everything, fits amazingly on and the style is so cute. Highly recommend for my plus size girls.
I love a Shirtdress and this one was another one. I styled with a jacket and boots. Also with sandals and with denim and a tank underneath.
Flowy and comfy. Belted once for event. Lots of compliments.
I wore this dress to work and it was perfect! I was debating between size 6 and 8 and am happy I went with the 8.
Very cute but shorter than I expected. It came about arm's length on me. Very comfortable though.

I loved everything about this frock. So easy to wear and incredibly light and breezy. The blue and white stripe was a great choice for spiring. Thought about buying this one but talked myself out of it. Would rent again!
First, the details are amazing. It has pockets and it is lined. Amazing. It’s trendy, but not overly so. Great fit, but enough interest that it doesn’t look dumpy. You’ll love!!
This was a perfect “work” dress for quarantine. I looked like I was wearing work clothes on top, but a shapeless sack on reality!

I loved this dress. It was super breathable. I got a 1x but I could have sized down, I wish I would have taken pictures to show. This is definitely a more casual dress. Good for a backyard party, beach day, or walking around with your kids on the weekend. 10/10 would recommend
This dress was definitely lose and flowy but the materials were crisp and nice. It was great to toss on and feel put together. Very comfortable.

I really loved this dress and am actually wearing it now as I write this review lol. It is over-sized, but in the best way, light & airy, and has just enough structure to balance the full skirt. I fully enjoyed wearing it this month and am trying to decide if I should keep it! Highly recommend!

So comfy, beautiful and easy to wear. The sleeves have a slight puff at the end that gives it a little flair and the material is so light and wearable. I will likely rent again when it is a little warmer out so I can wear with sandals and a sun hat. 10/10 recommend!
I loved wearing this. It was comfy to wear all day. The fabric was soft and light, but the lining kept it from being sheer. Was cute with sneakers, sandals and slippers (working from home...).
Loved how East this was to wear and style. Very comfy. Runs roomy.

I'm not petite (5'9") but when I went to rent the regular sizing was not available, ordered petite because I loved the look of this dress. Fit was all wrong, but that was expected. Dress might be a little see-through, might try to re-order in the proper sizing.
Perfect for weekends, brunch, errands. Ordered a petite and the length is nearly to my ankles (longer than photo). The skirt is lined so not see-through & pockets (!!!).
and quite the stares (the good kind). I felt relaxed yet chic and so comfortable.
Felt very comfy and pretty in this dress. It is loose fitting and comfortable.

This is the best dress ever! I have worn it several times, with a jean jacket, and by itself and it's amazing. Have gotten so many compliments on it!
Favorite dress. Flattering and comfortable. VERY FLOWY
I love this, I can wear it anywhere and its SO soft.

I wore the dress with a tan belt and pink leather sandals. I’m very short and long dresses tend to not fit but this fit perfectly. I got tons of compliments.

This dress is perfect. It was okay online but dare I say she’s better irl. The cut of the skirt and sleeve are fantastic and there’s a slight high low thing happening with the hem that is sooo good. For my busty ladies - it’s super flattering on the top / doesn’t make you look tent like or unaboob-y. RENT THIS

Such an easy classy dress. It is loose fitted so I expected it to hang and not be super tight, which I liked. Could easily add a belt to add some shape to it but I liked the simplicity of it. Could also easily be worn as a maternity style. Would be perfect for a brunch, Easter, work etc. overall I’d rent again!
I was excited to get this in my first shipment and it was everything I wanted. Fit perfectly (close-fitting) and love the color-blocking. Got tons of compliments and will purchase!
Cute but don’t love the colors like I thought I would
Loved it - bought it! Looks just like photos

I wore this a lot during my rental period. It was perfect quarantine wear, paired with high-waisted jeans or leggings. I will say it's a little more cropped than the photos make it look, so definitely take that into consideration!

Looked like a cool biker chick I loved it
Looks just like the picture except the neck is a bit higher than a traditional crewneck (which I liked). Very comfy. Exactly my style! Considered purchasing.

I wore this sweatshirt multiple times throughout the month. Super comfy and went with everything. I also loved the pop of color at the top.

Loved this vintage wrangler crew neck sweatshirt! So many compliments wearing this. It was true to size and went great with shorts and with jeans! I dressed it up a little for work too. Adding to my wardrobe!
Really liked this piece and got some compliments on it! More of a fitted look. Although I love the style and fit, not the most flattering color with the tan in my midsection.
This was a fun one to wear with some cool jeans. Loved the unique colors and the casual fit.
I loved this sweatshirt! It is super stylish and practical at the same time. It fits true to size and the material is nice. Would totally recommend!
Color, fit, comfort is on point. Super cute.
Wore this nonstop. Felt like it was a “dressier” sweatshirt than my other ones. YOLO. Why not wear a sweatshirt as often as possible and look good?
I mean, not much to say. It’s pretty perfect! think I’m gonna purchase!
Loved this sweatshirt! Perfect for a casual weekend look
Such a cute sweatshirt, the retro is very spot on. Wore a bunch of times and it was super comfy!

I LOVE this top. I haven't had a chance to wear it yet because it's been a little cold. But keeping it so I can as soon as the weather turns.

I’m an art teacher and this was the perfect work top- colorful and super cute. Very loose but I liked that. I would have purchased but it was pricey!

Beautiful. Classy. Can dress it up or down!

so cute!! perfect for sitting in your house, perfect for styling with more interesting things for going out. very comfy!! wore it a bunch.

so comfortable, but very cropped (great for a petite person, like me!)

Too bulky to wear as a crop, cuter in photos.
Absolutely comfortable and stylish. I wore this every day! I would have totally bought this if I was allowed to leave my house (thanks, COVID-19!)

Love the colors, cut and fit. Have been looking for cute comfy tops to wear while I video/chat with my patients. Beautiful details, nice length. Seriously considering keeping this one.
Fit great, super cute, just as pictured!

This shirt is beautiful!

Such a springy pretty print with nice fabric. Can we work loose or tucked in a bit and was so cute !

WOW! I saw this Jumpsuit at Anthro and loved it. I decided to rent it and it did not disappoint. I love this so much, it is so flattering and comfortable. Perfect for summer nights because it is a thinner material.

Made me feel dressed up while still feeling comfortable working from home. Oversized by design.

Go down if between sizes. The dress is kinda frumpy... I never actually wore it because I felt overwhelmed by it...

Great dress. Flattering and comfortable to wear. Fits true to size.
Easy day dress. Perfect for work

Love this dress, very flattering empire waist. Lots of compliments.

This was such a cute dress, I was excited to maybe purchase it.... until I tried it on. It is not good for people with big chests

Adorable!!! What else can I say?
Super comfy and so boho. Loved!

I wanted to love it, but I can’t even wear it outside the house.

I loved this jacket. Would buy it if I could afford it but because it's embellished it's not an everyday thing so wouldn't spend this much on a jacket that I wouldn't wear frequently. But it was beautiful, fit perfectly and I got a ton of compliments. Very fun.

It took me 20 minutes to figure out how to put this on, and I’m still not sure I got it. Think the slip was attached backwards to the dress. The slip was too small and the dress was definitely oversized. I had a lot of fun wearing it around my house, but I’m not sure I’d wear it to an event.
This dress is BEAUTIFUL. One note: the model in the picture is wearing it backwards! The bow goes on the back. It's even more fantastic than it looks.

This dress is AMAZING as far as fabric goes. The color. The sheer topper with a precious pattern. The fit is legit insane. And the model in the photo is wearing it backwards. The tie is bizarre. The waist line is asymmetrical in the worst possible way. This clothing item is so weird. I’m a little sad because I was so excited about it...

I'm obsessed with the color and sheer pattern of this dress, but I'm totally baffled by the cut. There is an asymmetric waist line that inexplicably includes a giant dip that runs from your chest past your bum - it's not really visible in the photos and I have no idea why you would do something that to this dress. Also, the model appears to be wearing the dress backwards in the photos - if you try to wear it the way it is shown you will have a giant tag in the front of the dress lining between your boobs. She can't be blamed, since it is a very confusing dress.

I loved wearing this dress. I fit well was but the slip was difficult to get over my bust in the waist area and there is not any give. The slip straps were sewn to the outer shell and the bow was actually in the back of the dress because of this. It was still so fun and flattering to wear!
Straps for the slip are very long and not adjsutable - top becomes low cut. Slip would be too tight if I were to size down.
Very flattering fit.
Ordered a size up and these were still small for me. I’d size up at least a size or two.
These were cool. But at 5’0” they were a bit long. I actually managed to wear them 2 or 3 times but they were too big.
I first ordered the 24. They fit perfectly except uncomfortable in the rise, too short. Adorable and perfect in every other way. So I ordered the 25 and they were too big everywhere
I was really hoping these would fit. I’m always a 27 in FP but only a 28 was available. I couldn’t even get them past my hips. Size up 3 sizes!

links_reviews_text: I styled this with a sweater. It fit well... wore to a brunch (pre-quarantine)

links_reviews_title: Not for those with a booty
links_reviews_text: Had high hopes for these pants but the sizing was way off. I have a booty and could not even get these up to my hips. Surprised that so many reviews say they run big. Nowhere near close to my regular size at all.

Really love the style of these pants, but they just aren't meant for ladies with curves. They are indeed very wide-legged and definitely on the longer side, but they worked fine for my height. The high waist is super flattering. They were a little loose around my waist, but EXTREMELY tight in my booty/hip/thigh area. If you have flatter buns and thinner legs, they would be perfect and probably run more true to size for that figure type.
Really fun pants but the wide leg is no joke. Expect these to be incredibly wide-legged. Love the high rise of the waist band. Cute with a cropped tee or hoody.

I actually ordered true to size and found these were too big in the waist. Sizing may be tricky because other people mention needing to size up. They were cute in theory, but not practical in fit. Also too way too long on me.
Great fit but soo wide legged it felt a bit tricky to pull off!
I couldn't fit in them and they are my regular size.

links_reviews_title: So cute but so big and long
links_reviews_text: I totally love these but I ordered the wrong size (I took advice from other to size up but I sized wayyyy too up) and they were v long. I want to love these
Very wide leg, very high waist—also a bit long. I wore my dr martens with them and they were perfect. Different than any of my other wide leg pieces so I decided to buy.
I never got a chance to wear them, but very cute!

I’m on the short side but these are extremely long. They dragged on the floor even with my 4 inch platforms. Also, the width of the leg at the bottom is more extreme than shown in the photo. The high waist and fitted hips are so flattering though so if you’re super tall you will love this look.
I loved these pants! Perfect for tall girls as they have a longer length. So cute-- would definitely recommend
I am 5'4 and these pants were way too long and baggy
Way too long and overly baggy. I'm petite but these still seemed extremely long for the size. Couldn't wear.

These didn't fit me - I want to try them again but I'll size up next time. They buttoned but gave me camel toe and were extremely tight at the hips and thighs so I didn't want to wear them out. The fabric was soft.
I love the waist of the pants, they were very comfy and stylish, but we're about 3 inches too long on me.

links_reviews_title: Adorbs but run a tiny bit small
links_reviews_text: I went one size up and these fit perfect. Super cute and got a lot of compliments. Thinking about buying them.
This really is a beautiful dress. The fabric is nice a thick (which I personally like but might not be the best for a hot summer day) and lays nicely. Of note the bust area fit pretty tight on me.
Beautiful high quality dress. Photographs well.

I got this for a rehearsal dinner, but unfortunately the wedding was postponed due to coronavirus closures. Seriously will rent this again! It was the perfect length for me at 5'4, so classy and refined. Top was a bit tight but not unmanageable.
Would be perfect for a summer soirée or a fancy spring dinner. I was obsessed and hope to rent it again. Didn’t get to wear it because #pandemic.
Love this dress. I’m so sad I didn’t get to wear it as I had originally ordered it to wear to a horse race/derby party that was cancelled due to covid-19. Would rent again for another occasion.
Stunning, but too tight in the bust for me to wear. Would definitely recommend but size up!

Amazing dress but runs pretty small, I would recommend sizing up. I ordered my typical xs but it did not zip up over my bust and was tight in the armpits. If you are bigger chested I might even go up two sizes. I would totally rent again in my correct size!!

I was so excited for this dress -in pictures this it looks great and interesting, but in person, it feels like it was made from cheap sheets, so the basketweave detail on the bust is really odd. Great concept, but the fabric threw it off completely for me. I couldn't zip it all the way up, as the bust was too tight, but I wasn't mad because I wouldn't have worn it anyways.

links_reviews_text: high neckline with tie, quite fitted in the bust area, slight cap sleeve, ankle-length, lightweight cotton fabric

Love the color, but the proportions are strange. I wear 36DD, the dress was too big around my boobs but tight around the ribs. If you have a large chest and small ribcage it might work better. The belt was too small, I wear a 12 in dresses usually and i could barely get it clasped on the last grommet hole. Again weird sizing on the belt, felt like a belt for smaller dress? The color is beautiful but the fabric is not very soft and a bit stiff. XL fit like id expect a m/l to fit.
Dress up or dress down... the perfect comfy statement dress. VERY comfortable, lots of compliments. Belt waist perfect for hourglass shape.

Very comfortable and easy dress. The color is so beautiful in person and it is a very fun and flattering cut. Sizing runs true and it is easy to dress up with wedges or down with sneakers. I am buying this! I love it.

I love the design of the dress, but the rib/top of waist button is super tight. kind of weirdly so compared to the rest of the dress and buttons. I think I could get away with the belt hiding it (it's pulling open slightly), but kind of not into the effort. Otherwise it's a beautiful color and design, and may be better suited for someone with a more narrow rib cage.

I love this dress on the model but couldn’t even do it up! Normally an XL in most Free People items (for example a dress and top in my last orders) but this was teeny. I couldn’t do up a single button between the mid thighs to bust. I had to check that I wasn’t sent the wrong size. I’m between a 14 and a 16 usually. I would say an XL would fit a 12 max in this dress.
Was not for me.
This was cute but the slip was really awkward so I never wore it out
Loved this dress!

I have LOVED wearing this dress. Many compliments every time. It's perfect for Spring. The lace details are lovely and the xs fit was perfect for my petite frame. I gave it 4 stars bc the slip has an awkward fit and (even when wearing the slip) the dress is a bit see through. Skin-tone undergarments are a MUST. Overall I highly recommend for its feminine boho flair!

links_reviews_text: I'm on the fence about this dress. The neck line and top are stunning. But the skirt feels bulky and frumpy. The dress is sheer, and so is the under slip. Have to rock the nude undies or an extra slip to make it wearable.
